item.wzry.sujizhiqiang.tooltip.descripti: Increase attack damage by 3 points (double the effect while using long-range weapons)
item.wzry.moshi.tooltip.description: attack is accompanied by 8% of the target's current HP
item.wzry.pojun.tooltip.description: Deal additional 30% damage to targets whose HP is less than 50%
item.wzry.mingdaosiming.tooltip.descript: Being invincible for 1.5s and gain 60% movement speed increase when receiving deadly damage,
item.wzry.fanjia.tooltip.description1: Return 25% of the damage to the attacker
item.wzry.fanjia.tooltip.description2: Return damage of 10% maxHP to the attacker if one damage is greater than 20% maxHP
